      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String ZombieAttackAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Execute this action Let the zombie attack a attackable actor The zombie will attack the target either using the weapon it is holding or its intrinsic Weapon

      java.lang.String TargetedAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the action based on the number of aims, shows a sub menu to the Player if the number of aims is lesser than 2, this action instance will be added to the list of available actions so that we can keep track of the numbe rof counts
      java.lang.String SowAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map) 
      java.lang.String ShotgunShootAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the action searches the 3 squares area from the selected direction checks if any actor is in range, and shoot those actors
      java.lang.String ShotgunDirectionAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes this action Shows the list of available directions to shoot in a sub menu
      java.lang.String RifleShootAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes this action checks how many aims did the Player spend Attack is based on the number of aims where: no aims: 75% of hitting the target 1 aim: 90% of hitting the target 2 aims: 100% chance to hit, instakill
      java.lang.String RifleSelectTargetAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the action Conducts a breadth first search algorithm Put all targets in range to a sub menu for the Player to choose
      java.lang.String QuitGameAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Executes the action Removes the player from the map which triggers the game to stop
      java.lang.String LoadGunAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Execute the action Loads two bullets into the gun per ammunition

      Execute the action Removes the Capability of the Zombie Limb and add in a Weapon capbability By doing this will allow this item to be used as a Weapon

      protected java.lang.String AttackAction.isTargetConscious(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Checks whether the target is Conscious If the target is not conscious, create a new corpse PortableItem and remove the target from the map
